Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 3.3 Å (PLD), 4.8 Å wide donut-shaped pore aperture

Other Information.Additional Info: Enhanced permeability observed in Pebax-based MMMs
Slower diffusion compared to carbon dioxide

Experimental Validation.Method: Gas permeation test using custom-built instrumentation
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2/N2 selectivity: up to 4.21 in Pebax-based MMMs

Other Information.Additional Info: Zn3 acts as a molecular sieve for CO2 over N2 separation.

Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: Slightly larger than 3.3 Å (exact value not reported)

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Faster diffusion due to smaller kinetic diameter

Other Information.Additional Info: Enhanced permeability observed in both Pebax- and PVDF-based MMMs

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Slower diffusion due to larger kinetic diameter

Other Information.Additional Info: Nitrogen gas can enter the pores but with slower kinetics than CO2

Sieving Mechanism: Kinetic sieving based on faster diffusion of thinner gases

Experimental Validation.Method: Gas permeation test using custom-built instrumentation
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2/N2 selectivity: up to 7.33 in Pebax-based MMMs

Other Information.Additional Info: Zn2Cd allows both CO2 and N2 to enter the pores but shows enhanced CO2 permeability due to faster diffusion kinetics.
